document.full_text: procter & gamble co  lowered the high end of its profit forecast for the year, as it does what it can to trim costs and increases some prices to offset rising costs for materials.
document.title: procter & gamble lowers top end of forecast
lines_and_colors: procter & gamble co  lowered the high end of its profit forecast for the year, as it does what it can to trim costs and increases some prices to offset rising costs for materials.
